meanings.sent1: The decennial celebration brought the whole town together.
meanings.sent2: The decennial report highlighted the population growth over the past ten years.
meanings.sent3: The decennial party was so much fun, we should have one every year!
meanings.sent4: The decennial rhythm of nature's cycles reminds us of the passing of time.
meanings.sent5: The decennial event was a memorable milestone for the community.

meanings.definition: Lasting for a period of ten years.
meanings.sent1: The decennial contract ensured stability for the next decade.
meanings.sent2: The decennial project will require long-term planning and commitment.
meanings.sent3: Wearing the same decennial outfit for ten years would be quite a fashion statement!
meanings.sent4: The decennial journey of the comet through the solar system was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The decennial commitment to excellence set a high standard for the team.
